content: **c2c lemon peel stitch dishcloth - pdf crochet pattern** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable pdf version of this crochet pattern the lemon peel stitch has such beautiful texture especially when worked on the diagonal using corner to corner crochet technique this pattern includes a video tutorial to show you how to work up this dishcloth on my youtube channel finished size - approx 8 inches square this crochet pattern is easy to follow and intermediate-beginner-friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheters be sure to check out the video tutorial on my youtue channel materials -worsted-weight cotton yarn i used approx 85 yards of wecrochet dishie yarn -crochet hook 4 5 mm size -yarn needle for weaving in ends **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose in whole or in part please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
